name: Heat Pump Clothes Dryer Rebate
description: Up to $250 rebate for replacing gas dryer with high-efficiency heat pump dryer; income-qualified customers may receive up to $350
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power provides rebates for Santa Clara residents switching from gas to high-efficiency heat pump dryers, which use less energy than standard electric dryers.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $250 rebate for heat pump dryer
- Up to $350 for income-qualified customers
- Must replace gas dryer
- Heat pump dryers use 50% less energy
- More efficient than standard electric dryers
- Gentler on clothes
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Replace gas dryer with heat pump dryer
3. Purchase qualifying heat pump clothes dryer
4. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
5. Submit proof of purchase
6. Income-qualified submit additional documentation
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, heat pump dryer, clothes dryer, Santa Clara, $250, $350, gas replacement, laundry
